entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers. Low plus 5 with temperature rising to 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few showers beginning late this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h after midnight. Low plus 5 with temperature rising to 8 by morning. Forecast issued 10:50 PM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Clearing. High 20.
